aservio.data

Class UserRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • aservio.data.UserRetriever

  • public class UserRetriever
extends java.lang.Object
    Used as a module in IRepositoryImp to organize and as an implementation to get access to everything related to the user. Similar to ActivityRetriever and DocumentRetriever
